channel.title: Admins Glow and Pk commands
channel.description: Can someone help me i need to know how to make the Admins Glow and make a command to turn pk on and off can someone help me please

item.title: Admins Glow and Pk commands
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

There’s probably a misplaced bracket somewere.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins Glow and Pk commands
item.dc:creator: @mudvayne5493 mudvayne5493
item.description:
@mudvayne5493 wrote:

[quote=“xxchainxx, post:2, topic:95982”]i have admin glow comands leme find right quick[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 04:19:03 PM[/size][hr]ok add this into your commands:

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pmodglow”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
pmodglow = true;
}

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglow") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pmodglowoff") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglowoff") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglowoff") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = false;
    }[/code]

now add this under public int untradable

public boolean adglow = false; public boolean pmodglow = false; public boolean ownerglow = false;

now find this

public boolean process

and add this under the last {

if (adglow == true) {//Admin Glow stillgfx(246, absY, absX); } if (pmodglow == true) {//PMod Glow stillgfx(247, absY, absX); } if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow stillgfx(332, absY, absX); }

and there u go =)[/quote]
Umm not to be mean but thats crap I did it exactly how you did and got 100 errors =\ there must be a prob there somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins Glow and Pk commands
item.dc:creator: @xxchainxx xxchainxx
item.description:
@xxchainxx wrote:

i have admin glow comands leme find right quick[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 04:19:03 PM[/size][hr]ok add this into your commands:

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pmodglow”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
pmodglow = true;
}

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglow") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglow") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = true;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pmodglowoff") && playerRights >= 1)
    {
           pmodglow =false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminglowoff") && playerRights >= 2)
    {
           adglow = false;
    }

    else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ownerglowoff") && playerRights >= 3)
    {
           ownerglow = false;
    }[/code]

now add this under public int untradable

public boolean adglow = false; public boolean pmodglow = false; public boolean ownerglow = false;

now find this

public boolean process

and add this under the last {

if (adglow == true) {//Admin Glow stillgfx(246, absY, absX); } if (pmodglow == true) {//PMod Glow stillgfx(247, absY, absX); } if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow stillgfx(332, absY, absX); }

and there u go =)
